name: Lord Linus Business hours
author: lordlinus

sections.description: This plugin allows you to add a widget on your website which shows the business hours of your business on your website
sections.installation:
Here is what you need to do:

  1. Install plugin OR unzip the downloaded file to /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Go to your plugin settings and enable the plugin.
  3. In the sidebar you will have a new section called ‘Contact Us’ navigate there and set your preferences.
  4. goto appearance = > widget,you will see a plugin named “Lordlinus buisness hours”, activate it and you will be able to see your buienss hour when updated through the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.1

Fixed bug of the activation time

1.0

This version provides basic functionality to set business hours

short_description: This plugin allows you to add a widget on your website which shows the business hours of your business on your website
